summary: The heir to a village elder's family squanders his inheritance and bullies all and sundry.
cast: Mohanlal|Revathi|Nedumudi Venu|Innocent|Napolean|V.K. Sriraman|Maniyanpilla Raju|Augustine|Chitra|Seeta|Bharathi|Cochin Hanifa|Delhi Ganesh|Janardanan|Sankaradi|Oduvil Unnikrishnan|Raghu|Sreenath|Jagannatha Varma|Jose Prakash|Jagannathan|I.V. Sasi|Bhagyalakshmi|Ramu
title: Devasuram
